awards.title: Best Group Project - UChicago Summer Tech Showcase 2023

publications.name: Power-on-Touch: Powering Actuators, Sensors, and Devices during Interaction
publications.summary: Power-on-Touch turns your hand into a wireless power source. A slim coil on the hand/finger inductivley transmits energy to tiny receiver tags inside everyday gadgets, waking them only while you touch, tap, or hover. No batteries, no cords—just lighter, maintenance‑free products that spring to life the moment you reach for them.
